analysis_racial: Specifically targeting native English speakers will exclude those with a sufficiently high level of English but not from an English speaking background.
text: :  . ,  . :  , , , , . :  . ALIBRA SCHOOL is inviting native speakers to work in a team of professional teachers in order to provide high English levels of our students. Job Description: Teaching English offline at the territory of different companies or our schools. Teaching general and business English using materials provided by the school. Teaching in groups and individually. Jod Requirements: Bachelors degree in teaching or Certificates (TEFL/ TKT/ etc). A minimum of 2 years experience as a teacher. solid grounding in classroom management and school procedures. Outstanding written and verbal communication skills. {"document_id": "Kaggle::techmap::6152e25bdc738241ea1839aa::headhunter_ru", "source": "headhunter_ru", "country": "RU", "company": "АЛИБРА", "position": "Native-Speaking Teacher of English", "notes": "", "original": "

Требуемый опыт работы: не требуется

Частичная занятость, полный день

Возможно временное оформление: договор услуг, подряда, ГПХ, самозанятые, ИП

Возможна подработка: по вечерам

ALIBRA SCHOOL is inviting native speakers to work in a team of professional teachers in order to provide high English levels of our students.

Job Description:

Teaching English offline at the territory of different companies or our schools;

Teaching general and business English using materials provided by the school;

Teaching in groups and individually

Jod Requirements:

  • Bachelor’s degree in teaching or Certificates (TEFL/ TKT/ etc).
  • A minimum of 2 years experience as a teacher
  • solid grounding in classroom management and school procedures
  • Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
  • Well-organized with excellent leadership abilities.
  • Exceptional interpersonal and presentation skills.

Ключевые навыки

Presentation skills
Time management
Driving Licence B
Teambuilding
Leadership Skills
"}
